message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm being generous!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
You're getting desperate, I can tell!
I'm trying to be reasonable, but you're going to have to meet me halfway!
You're getting lowball, I'm going to take the high road!
I'm trying to hold on, but you're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get the deal done!
You're getting close to rock bottom, time to make a serious offer!
I'm making one last stand, meet me halfway or it's war!
